definition-item.definition-title: MAKING CONTAINERS OF PAPER, CARDBOARD OR MATERIAL WORKED IN A MANNER ANALOGOUS TO PAPER (making wound articles, e.g. wound tubes, B31C; combined making and filling B65B)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Making wound articles, e.g. wound tubes
Combined making and filling

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Filling, or other packaging operations
Packaging machines incorporating means for making containers
Box and bags
Handling thin material, e.g. sheets, web

section-body.paragraph-text: When a document is classified in one of the groups B31B50/00 - B31B70/99, it must also be classified completely in the groups by allocating the appropriate Indexing Codes as provided for in B31B2100/00 - B31B2170/30 and B31B2247/00. Classification in B31B2100/00 - B31B2170/00 is mandatory.
All aspects disclosed by the documents must be classified ( deep-indexing).
Example illustrating deep-indexing:
"A device for forming a multilayered tubular web into flat bags. In one embodiment a handle is formed by punching".
This document will be given the following classification:
All relevant information contained in a document must be classified, irrespective its position in the document: description, claims or figures are to be treated with equal importance.
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Envelopes or bags
essentially flexible containers, the final shape of which is determined by their contents
Boxes or cartons
including bags formed similarly to cartons, trays with upstanding side-walls, barrels, tubes and cups, other than articles formed by winding

definition-item.definition-title: Making rigid or semi-rigid containers, e.g. boxes or cartons

section-body.paragraph-text: Documents relating to box making must be classified in at least one sub-group of B31B50/00 and at least one of the sub-groups of B31B2100/00 - B31B2120/00

definition-item.definition-title: {Prebreaking}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Breaking creases to facilitate setting-up boxes in relation to packaging operations

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Closing boxes in relation to packaging operations

definition-item.definition-title: {Holders for feeding or positioning blanks or webs}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Holders for the work piece.
Holders carrying feeding and guiding means.

definition-item.definition-title: Making flexible containers, e.g. envelopes or bags

section-body.paragraph-text: Documents relating to bag making must be classified in at least one subgroup of B31B70/00 and in at least one of the subgroups of B31B2150/00 - B31B2170/00.

definition-item.definition-title: {Applying the closure elements in the machine direction}

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machine direction
indicates the main direction of transport of the sheets or webs through the machine

definition-item.definition-title: {Applying the closure elements in the cross direction}

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cross direction
indicates a direction perpendicular to the main direction of transport or the sheets of webs through the machine

definition-item.definition-title: {the strings being applied in the machine direction}

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machine direction
indicates the main direction of transport of the sheets or webs through the machine

definition-item.definition-title: {the strings being applied in the cross direction}

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cross direction
indicates a direction perpendicular to the main direction of transport of the sheets or webs through the machine
